<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_acct_consumer.CSQueryBRUtilOOBAccountConsumerConstants</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Role configuration constants that Query business rule helper functions for Customer Service Management can call</description>
        <name>CSQueryBRUtilOOBAccountConsumerConstants</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var CSQueryBRUtilOOBAccountConsumerConstants = Class.create();
CSQueryBRUtilOOBAccountConsumerConstants.prototype = {
	
    initialize: function() {
    },
    type: 'CSQueryBRUtilOOBAccountConsumerConstants'
};

CSQueryBRUtilOOBAccountConsumerConstants.ROLE_CONDITIONS_POOL = {},
	
CSQueryBRUtilOOBAccountConsumerConstants.ROLE_PERMISSIONS_POOL = {
	
	'sn_acct_consumer.consumer': {
			'customer_account' : {'access_context': ['accounts_from_account_counsumer']}
	},

	'sn_acct_consumer.agent': {
		'sn_customerservice_case' : {'condition': 'account_not_empty', 'access_context': ['all_accounts']},
		'csm_order_case'          : {'condition': 'account_not_empty', 'access_context': ['all_accounts']}
	},
};
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>

        <sys_package display_value="Customer Data Models for B2B2C" source="sn_acct_consumer">cdd5b05565a6a410f87774d7193784cd</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Customer Data Models for B2B2C">cdd5b05565a6a410f87774d7193784cd</sys_scope>
